answers.answer: Im the same!:) 30 weeks too! With a baby girl <3
Yay Congrats! I'm 34 weeks with 6 go go (: I also don't think I will do the whole 40 weeks, its just a feeling I have! Thinking around 38weeks!
aww! Joceey we are both due in June! But everybody, including my doctor thinks he will come at the end of may. I look like i'm about to burst! He's already big & strong lol.. congrats to you both (:
I'm 31 weeks tomorrow (: they're anticipating early delivery though so we shall see if I make it to June too! Best of luck mommies
Thank you shelly (: but why are they thinking about early delivery? Is everything ok..
There's some blood flow restriction in the umbilical cord. They're trying to keep her in the oven til atleast 34 weeks (or longer if things go well)
I'm also 30 wks today!!! With a little girl :-) I feel like its a milestone for 30 wks lol
oh my.. good luck with everything shelly!!
I have 5 days left, bein' Induced on the 18th due to Preeclampsia. I'll be 39 weeks so It's not too bad. I juss wish he would come out before I get Induced lol.
With my firstborn he went past his due date. And it feel like this baby will too. I just want to make it to May that all. I have 18 days until my due date.

I defiantly DON'T want to go over. It would be nice for him to come at the end of may (: ugh i'm so excited! I just want to meet him already! Lanny & Nelly, you guys are super close!!! I'm jealous lol
I am just so excited for my baby girl to get here. I bet you are ready too.
I'll be 32 weeks on tuesday! I cant wait for my lil girl ti get here! I hope she comes before 40 weeks lol

I'll be 34 weeks this coming Tuesday with my first. Doctor said that he would be happy to get her to 38 weeks. I've had problems with my blood pressure and swelling. Done had to get two steroid shots while in the hospital to help develop her lungs. He says that I can't have her natural.. getting more nervous as time gets closer and closer.. Good luck to all you mommies

question: Today i'm 30 weeks pregnant! Yaayyy!!! only 10 weeks to go, or less. I think he will come sooner.. i just have this feeling that i won't be pregnant for the whole 40 weeks. But we shall see! Bf & i are beyond excited! We are getting so close, we can't wait to meet our first child (:How many weeks do you have left?
title: COUNT DOWN!!!
